ComicInfo.Summary:
Antarctic brings you more sensational stories of pulp-era heroes Black Jaq, Crimson Scorpion and Crimebuster 76, reimagined and created anew for the modern day! Thrill to yet more pulse-pounding adventures in every issue of Exciting!
ContentsCrimson Scorpion: The Cat and the BugDarkdevil: Inner Demons, Part 1*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover (Eyelash) | Brian Denham | 1 | RE | Online Exclusive Variant Cover (Darkdevil) | John Rhodes (p), Evan Quiring (i) & Laurie Foster (c) | 2 |
